com.cogi.audioprocessor

Class Mp3Encoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cogi.audioprocessor.Mp3Encoder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.concurrent.Callable<java.io.File>

    public class Mp3Encoder
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.concurrent.Callable<java.io.File>
    Encodes wav files to MP3.

      • setInput

        public void setInput(java.io.File inputFile)
        Specifies the wav file to encode.

        inputFile - wav file

      • setOutput

        public void setOutput(java.io.File outputFile)
        Specifies the file to which to encode the audio
        Parameters:
        outputFile - mp3 file. It doesn't need to exist already.

      • setQuality

        public void setQuality(int quality)
        Specifies the quality of the audio.

        Defaults to 3 if not called.

        Parameters:
        quality - Quality between 0 (best, but slow) and 9 (worst, but faster)

      • setBitRate

        public void setBitRate(int bitrate)
        Specifies the bitrate of the encoded file.
        Parameters:
        bitrate - Desired bit rate in kbps

      • setBufferSize

        public void setBufferSize(int bufferSize)
        Specify the size of the buffer to be used.

        Defaults to 4096 if not called.

        Parameters:
        bufferSize - Buffer size in bytes.

      • call

        public java.io.File call()
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Encodes the audio.

        Returns:

        Throws:
